Name: Catlike Magic
About the game: This game is currently available for free as a web version, keep this in mind before buying. You wake up one day feeling a sharp pain through your chest. All of a sudden, your senses start to betray you. Your innards feel as if they were on fire, girls appear cuter the more you look at them: you have been cursed! Delve into the dark depths of the rainforest and find the crypt from which your enchantment came! Catlike Magic is a top-down auto-shooter bullet hell game where you play as a tiny cat mage trying to rid herself of a curse. Features Various magic powers to hurt your enemies with. Special modifiers that significantly improve or change the function of your abilities. Goblins that send you flying across the screen. 30+ unique items that increase your stats and give you special effects. 4 different playable characters, from tiny cats to bigger cats to goblins.
